pr_title: Adds menu entry swaps for Buy 1/5/10/50 and Sell 1/5/10/50.

timeline.author: Nightfirecat

+package net.runelite.client.plugins.menuentryswapper;
+
+import lombok.Getter;
+import lombok.RequiredArgsConstructor;
+
+@Getter
+@RequiredArgsConstructor
+public enum BuyMode
+{
+	OFF("Off"),
+	BUY_1("Buy 1"),
+	BUY_5("Buy 5"),
+	BUY_10("Buy 10"),
+	BUY_50("Buy 50");
+
+	private final String name;
+
+	@Override
+	public String toString()
+	{
+		return name;
+	}

timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: Added this for other similar menu entry swaps as well.
replies.author: geheur

timeline.message: Changes the buy/sell swap to be item-specific to prevent accidental buying/selling of items. Now, swaps are enabled by shift-rightclicking an item in a shop, or an item in your inventory while the shop interface is open. Also adds a config to enable/disable this (defaults to enabled) so that people will know that this feature exists and how to use it.
Changes the swap to only happen when shift is held, to prevent accidental buying/selling.
Adds menu entry swaps for Buy 1/5/10/50 and Sell 1/5/10/50 options when trading with shops.
Changes the swap to only happen when shift is held, to prevent accidental buying/selling.
Changes the swap to only happen when shift is held, to prevent accidental buying/selling.

timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: I changed this so that I could have the option strings in BuyMode and Sellmode have the same capitalization as they do in-game, rather than already being in lower case. Should I change BuyMode and Sellmode to just have the option be lowercase to start with?
replies.author: geheur
